dosing.notes: XR needs to be taken on empty stomach or light meal.

canadian_clinical.starting_dose: 50mg (IR) or 300mg (XR) depending on urgency/indication. Low dose (25mg) for sleep is off-label.
canadian_clinical.titration_schedule: Schizophrenia/Mania: Day 1: 50mg BID, D2: 100mg BID, D3: 150mg BID, D4: 200mg BID. XR can be titrated faster (Day 1: 300mg, Day 2: 600mg).
canadian_clinical.inpatient_strategy: Aggressive titration (XR strategy) usually tolerated well under observation. Day 1: 300mg, Day 2: 600mg.
canadian_clinical.outpatient_strategy: Slower IR titration may be preferred if sedation is a concern (e.g., start 25-50mg QHS).
canadian_clinical.max_dose_practice: Certain refractory cases may see up to 1000mg-1200mg (rare, off-label with monitoring).

cautions.renal: Start lower dose (25mg/day), increase by 25-50mg daily.
cautions.pregnancy: Risk/Benefit analysis (Category C). Risk of EPS in neonate.
